description.value:
You unlock more powerful primal spells. You gain your choice of one warden spell from the advanced warden spells.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animal Feature]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Enlarge Companion]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Hunter's Luck]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Soothing Mist]

Special You can take this feat multiple times, choosing a different advanced warden spell each time.
